√dā2 'divide, share'

present: [1.] dā́ti etc.   -- dyáti etc.  

perfect: dadire  

aorist: [1.] adāt  deyāt  adimahi  adīm-   -- [4.] diṣīya  

future: [1.] dāsyati   -- [2.] dātā  

verbal: diná  dita  dāta  -tta B.+  -dā́ya B.+  -diya?  

secondary: passive: dīyate etc. AV.+   -- intensive: dādā-  dedi-   -- desiderative: ditsa-  didāsa-  dīdāṅsa-   -- causative: dāpayīta  

derivatives: -tti  dā́tu RV.  -dātavya C.  dā́tṛ RV.C.  dā́tra RV.  dāná? RV.  -dā́na AV.B.S.  -dānīya B.S.  dā́nu V.  dāyá? RV.  díti? RV.  -deya C.  

A form of this root is day, given above separately.
